body: To get access to crash dumps uploaded to Microsoft, we apparently need to sign our executables and sign up for the [Windows Desktop Application Program](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/appxpkg/windows-desktop-application-program).

milestone.title: 20th Anniversary - Initial Release?
milestone.description: Jedi Academy turns 20! Might be a good time for an initial release?

title: Windows Desktop Application Program
